attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The level of Public Spending in Wales and Scotland, is higher on a per capita basis than in England, and has been for some time.
As the Barnett formula is not statutory, does your Government intend renegotiating it. If so -- when ?.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
